transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? haan kaun aaya tha idhar se?
Executive: Uh, yes sir, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi sir Preeti ki manager thi. Aapka ek catalog hai na Comet Technologies karke IndiaMART se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To uske regarding hi baat karna tha. Abhi aap Kedar Nath ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, Vinay baat kar raha.
Executive: Vinay ji baat kar rahe hain. Thik hai, main aapko na apne side se call laga rahi hu sir, aap please answer kijiyega call.
Customer: Uh, kya hua? Thik hai.
Executive: Main keh rahi hu main aapko apne side se call laga rahi hu, aap please mera call answer kijiyega.
Customer: Kab laga? Ek ghanta chhod ke lagao na, main thoda system pe baith ke call receive karta hu.
Executive: Done, done. Chaliye main aapko ek ghante baad call kar leti hu, koi issue nahi hai. Okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to discuss about the catalog.

- Customer wants the executive to call after an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, call, indiaMART
